name: title
Kononenko 12mm beam MTCDZ 10 wks: Kinematic of 10-week-old MTCDZ mice walking on a 12 mm wide beam

name: description
Kononenko 12mm beam MTCDZ 10 wks: Original SIMI videos, DeepLabCut-tracked videos and csv files of body kinematics of 10-week-old L7-Cre;AP2µflox/flox;R26-Ai9-LSL-tdTomato mice walking on a wide 12 mm beam. Mixed group of control and mutant mice. Individual trials for each mouse are recorded from 8 cameras and metadata for synchronization is stored as *.smp files.
